name: amethyst.host
description: Hosting service providing Minecraft servers at a small price.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist&&mkdir dist&&cp -r src/* dist&&echo '[amethyst-build] building (linux)'&&npx tsc -p .
scripts.sql: echo '[amethyst-db] merging sql files'&&sqlite3 data/db/database.db < dist/sql/init.sql
scripts.winbuild: rmdir /s /q dist&&mkdir dist&&xcopy /s src\* dist&&echo '[amethyst-build] building (windows)&&tsc -p .
scripts.update: git pull && npm run build && pm2 restart 0
scripts.ls: npm run build && npm run nstart

author: Amethyst
